analyzed: de rnam par dag pas zas lnga zhes me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri dang lha bshos dang de rnams kyi gzhal yas khang brgyan pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since those are pure, the five offerings are called “flowers, incense, lamps, perfume, and food,” and their adorned celestial mansion.

original: de la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed pa thams cad kyang de ltar snang bar 'dod de /
analyzed: de la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed pa thams cad kyang de ltar snang bar 'dod de /
translated: It is asserted that all the qualities of a buddha, such as those, appear in that way.

original: thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because all of them are concordant with the cause of the dharmadhātu.

original: de bas na bla ma'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: de bas na bla ma'i zhal snga nas /
translated: Therefore, the guru says:

original: me tog spos chab mar me che //
analyzed: me tog spos chab mar me che //
translated: Flowers, scented water, and great lamps,

original: dri zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: dri zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: and the maṇḍala called “perfume,”🔽the lamp of the Dharma of mental joy,🔽the incense of the accumulation of praise,🔽the flower of the limbs of enlightenment,

original: yid dga' chos kyi sgron ma dang // bsngags pa 'dus pa'i bdug spos dang // byang chub yan lag me tog dang // chos kyi zas ni lha bshos so //
analyzed: yid dga' chos kyi sgron ma dang // bsngags pa 'dus pa'i bdug spos dang // byang chub yan lag me tog dang // chos kyi zas ni lha bshos so //
translated: and the food of Dharma is food.

original: zhes so // rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: zhes so // rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: Also, the Root Tantra says:

original: mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa //
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa //
translated: Adorned with the five offerings.

original: zhes so / sna tshogs padma zhes pa ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'i padma'i lha'i gdan bcu dgu'o //
analyzed: zhes so / sna tshogs padma zhes pa ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'i padma'i lha'i gdan bcu dgu'o //
translated: The multicolored lotuses are the nineteen divine seats of the multicolored lotuses.

original: de yang 'gro ba ma lus pa dang tha mi dad par bstan kyang der gtogs pa'i nyes bas ma gos pas sdong bu dang bcas pa'i gdan gyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'gro ba ma lus pa dang tha mi dad par bstan kyang der gtogs pa'i nyes bas ma gos pas sdong bu dang bcas pa'i gdan gyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'o //
translated: Moreover, although it is taught that [the mandala] is not different from all migrating beings, it is beautified by the seats with stems, because it is unstained by the faults belonging to those [migrating beings].

original: nyi ma zhes pa ni bdun te /
analyzed: nyi ma zhes pa ni bdun te /
translated: The suns are seven.

original: lho dang nub dang byang gi re'u mig dang sgo bzhi sna tshogs padma gnas bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lho dang nub dang byang gi re'u mig dang sgo bzhi sna tshogs padma gnas bar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that they are in the southern, western, and northern squares and in the four gates of the multicolored lotus.

original: de yang sems can ma lus pa'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i ma rig pa'i mun nag rnam par sel cing mi dge ba bcu'i 'dam rdzab skem par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi myu gu smin par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ngo bo'o //🔽zla bar bcas zhes pa ni @143a * //
analyzed: de yang sems can ma lus pa'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i ma rig pa'i mun nag rnam par sel cing mi dge ba bcu'i 'dam rdzab skem par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi myu gu smin par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ngo bo'o // zla bar bcas zhes pa ni @143a * //
translated: Moreover, they are the essence of wisdom, because they remove the darkness of ignorance belonging to the mind-streams of all migrating beings, they dry up the swamp of the ten nonvirtues, and they ripen the sprouts of the spirit of enlightenment.🔽The moons

original: bcu gnyis te gnas lhag ma rnams su sna tshogs pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis te gnas lhag ma rnams su sna tshogs pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: are twelve, and they are located in the remaining seats of the multicolored lotus.

original: de yang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i myu gu smin par byed pas snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de yang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i myu gu smin par byed pas snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Moreover, it is the essence of great compassion because it pacifies the torment of afflictions of all sentient beings and ripens the sprouts of the roots of virtue.

original: lha'i gdan zhes pa ni lha bcu dgu grangs su bcad pa rnams kyi gdan yin par bstan to //
analyzed: lha'i gdan zhes pa ni lha bcu dgu grangs su bcad pa rnams kyi gdan yin par bstan to //
translated: The “divine seat” is taught to be the seat of the nineteen deities.

original: tshogs rdzogs shing snying rjes sems can brlan pa'i phyir bum pa gang bas kyang brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs rdzogs shing snying rjes sems can brlan pa'i phyir bum pa gang bas kyang brgyan pa'o //
translated: It is also adorned with a full vase because the assembly is complete and sentient beings are moistened with compassion.

original: de bas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bas gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa //
analyzed: tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa //
translated: The cause of completing the assembly

original: bum pa gang ba snying rjes brlan //
analyzed: bum pa gang ba snying rjes brlan //
translated: is a full vase moistened with compassion.

original: zhes so // de lta bu'i gdan de gong du smos pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes so // de lta bu'i gdan de gong du smos pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that such a seat is the immeasurable palace endowed with the previously mentioned qualities,

original: ma lus rin chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma lus rin chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: it is said, “all jewels,” and so on.

original: de la ma lus rin chen ni shel dang padma r'a g'a dang ma ra ka ta dang aindra n'i la la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la ma lus rin chen ni shel dang padma r'a g'a dang ma ra ka ta dang aindra n'i la la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therein, “all jewels” are crystal, ruby, sapphire, emerald, and so on.

original: des bkod pa ni phyogs rnams dgod cing mdzes par byas pa'o //
analyzed: des bkod pa ni phyogs rnams dgod cing mdzes par byas pa'o //
translated: That which is arrayed is the directions, which are set out and beautified.

original: gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa zhes pa ni dbu'i gtsug tor la sogs pas brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa zhes pa ni dbu'i gtsug tor la sogs pas brgyan pa ste /
translated: The palace is stacked, which is to say it is adorned with the uṣṇīṣa on the head and so forth.

original: shin tu mi sgrib pa'i khang ba sum brtsegs kyi tshul du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu mi sgrib pa'i khang ba sum brtsegs kyi tshul du gnas pa'o //
translated: It is a palace that is extremely unobscured, existing in the manner of a three-storied house.

original: de lta bu la gong du gsungs pa'i gdan rnams rab du bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu la gong du gsungs pa'i gdan rnams rab du bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
translated: One should meditate on the seats mentioned above in such a palace.

original: da ni rig pa skyes bu dang po'i sems skyed par byed pa'i rgyu rnam pa lnga gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rig pa skyes bu dang po'i sems skyed par byed pa'i rgyu rnam pa lnga gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the five causes that generate the first mind of the vidyā being are stated:

original: bcu drug ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcu drug ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: the sixteen parts, and so on.

original: de la bcu drug cha zhes pa ni a'a li sogs te cha shas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la bcu drug cha zhes pa ni a'a li sogs te cha shas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therein, the sixteen parts are the vowels, and so on, because they become the parts.

original: tshogs zhes pa ni ka la sogs pa so sor sder gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs zhes pa ni ka la sogs pa so sor sder gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The collection is the individual groups of the consonants, and so on.

original: de las byung ba ni rdzogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes te zla ba gnyis su des 'di ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni rdzogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes te zla ba gnyis su des 'di ston par 'gyur te /
translated: The moon maṇḍala is complete from that, which is to say the two moons.

original: mtha' yas tshogs kyis bsdus pa'i yi ge gsum dbus kyi gdan steng du babs pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de rnams la ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas sngon rdzogs par byed pa'i ched du rang gi bya ba bar chad pa
analyzed: mtha' yas tshogs kyis bsdus pa'i yi ge gsum dbus kyi gdan steng du babs pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de rnams la ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas sngon rdzogs par byed pa'i ched du rang gi bya ba bar chad pa
translated: The three syllables that gather the limitless hosts fall on the seat in the center, from which arise the completely pure tathāgatas.

original: bshig dogs nas mngon dga'i 'jig rten du gshegs par byas nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gzugs gong du smos pa'i cha shas kyi yi ge nyid ldan pa /
analyzed: bshig dogs nas mngon dga'i 'jig rten du gshegs par byas nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gzugs gong du smos pa'i cha shas kyi yi ge nyid ldan pa /
translated: Having seen those with the eyes of pristine consciousness, the tathāgatas of the ten directions and the four times, fearing that their activities will be interrupted, go to the world of Abhirati and, with the form of both method and wisdom, possess the aforementioned syllables.

original: de bzhin du tshogs kyi yi ge ka la sogs pa glang po'i yi ges @143b bstan pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldab kyi gzugs su gyur te /🔽de nas byon par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshogs kyi yi ge ka la sogs pa glang po'i yi ges @143b bstan pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldab kyi gzugs su gyur te /🔽de nas byon par byas te /
translated: Similarly, the syllables of the hosts, such as ka, and so on, become the form of the forty-two syllables of the elephant.

original: gzhal yas khang gi gtsug tor la gnas par byas nas des yi ge gsum pa las nang du zhugs par byas nas ye shes kyi yi ge dang gcig tu gyur nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'og dang steng du bkod pa las rim pa bzhin du skyes bu
analyzed: gzhal yas khang gi gtsug tor la gnas par byas nas des yi ge gsum pa las nang du zhugs par byas nas ye shes kyi yi ge dang gcig tu gyur nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'og dang steng du bkod pa las rim pa bzhin du skyes bu
translated: Having made it abide in the usnīṣa of the celestial mansion, one should cause it to enter into the three syllables, and having become one with the gnosis syllable, one should arrange it just as it is below and above, from which the thirty-two marks of a great being🔽and the eighty minor marks, and the two moons of the nature of engagement, aspiration, wisdom, and compassion are generated.

original: chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gyur pa dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang 'jug pa dang / smon pa dang / shes rab dang / snying rje'i rang bzhin zla ba gnyis bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gyur pa dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang 'jug pa dang / smon pa dang / shes rab dang / snying rje'i rang bzhin zla ba gnyis bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, the meaning is that one should meditate on the two moons.

original: de ltar zla ba gnyis thogs pa dri ma dang bral zhing shin tu 'od gsal ba'i phyir na gzhal yas khang gi'o //
analyzed: de ltar zla ba gnyis thogs pa dri ma dang bral zhing shin tu 'od gsal ba'i phyir na gzhal yas khang gi'o //
translated: As such, since the two moons are free from stains and are very clear, they are the celestial mansion.

original: cho ga bzhin du zhes pa ni de gnyis 'phro zhing 'du ba'i sbyor bas 'od du zhun sa gcig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du zhes pa ni de gnyis 'phro zhing 'du ba'i sbyor bas 'od du zhun sa gcig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: “According to the rite” means that through the yoga of the emanation and gathering of those two, they melt into light and become one.

original: tshad med 'od gzhi zhes pa ni tshad med pa'i 'od kyi gzhi 'dus pa gnag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la mnga' ba de la /
analyzed: tshad med 'od gzhi zhes pa ni tshad med pa'i 'od kyi gzhi 'dus pa gnag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la mnga' ba de la /
translated: The “base of immeasurable light” is the base of immeasurable light that is collected in the orb of the moon.

original: tshad med 'od gzhi bsam par bya //
analyzed: tshad med 'od gzhi bsam par bya //
translated: The base of immeasurable light is to be contemplated.

original: zhes so // des ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // des ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bstan pa'o //
translated: This teaches the gnosis of equality.

original: dam pa zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par byang chub pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam pa zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par byang chub pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Supreme” is because it is the essence of the manifest enlightenment of the tathāgatas.

original: dang po zhes pa ni thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: dang po zhes pa ni thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: “First” is Vajrasattva, because he is the cause of all.

original: de'i snying po ni yi ge h'um dmar po'o //
analyzed: de'i snying po ni yi ge h'um dmar po'o //
translated: His “essence” is the red letter hūṃ.

original: de las byung ba'i mchog gi rdo rje'i ye shes gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag par ston par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i mchog gi rdo rje'i ye shes gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag par ston par byed pa ste /
translated: From that, the supreme vajra gnosis, the nature of the five aggregates of form and so on, the five gnoses such as the mirror-like gnosis, perfectly teaches cause and effect.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po nor bu dmar skya bsgoms te /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po nor bu dmar skya bsgoms te /
translated: One should meditate on a red five-pronged vajra with an orange jewel.

original: de yang / dpag med 'od zer 'phro ba rnams kyis rab brgyan pa //
analyzed: de yang / dpag med 'od zer 'phro ba rnams kyis rab brgyan pa //
translated: adorned with immeasurable radiating light rays.

original: zhes pa ni thub pa grangs med pa'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i phyogs kun du 'phro zhing rnam par brgyan par byas par bsams nas /
analyzed: zhes pa ni thub pa grangs med pa'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i phyogs kun du 'phro zhing rnam par brgyan par byas par bsams nas /
translated: Having contemplated that the entire vajra realm is adorned with the light rays of immeasurable sages radiating everywhere,🔽endowed with the essence of the first,

original: dang po'i snying por ldan par zhes pa ni bum pa zla ba'i steng du mgon po h'um gi byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan par byas nas aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes nga rgyal dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: dang po'i snying por ldan par zhes pa ni bum pa zla ba'i steng du mgon po h'um gi byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan par byas nas aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes nga rgyal dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: means that the lord Hūṃ is empowered upon the moon in the vase, and one should be endowed with the pride of “oṃ vajra ātmāko ’haṃ.”

original: de rnams kyi so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes bstan pa'o //
translated: Those are the explanations of the individual gnoses.

original: sprul pa dpag med kyis zhes pa ni bum pa las 'phro ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs rnams @144a * //
analyzed: sprul pa dpag med kyis zhes pa ni bum pa las 'phro ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs rnams @144a * //
translated: With immeasurable emanations means that Vairocana and so on emanate from the vase.

original: kyis so // 'gro don bla med mdzad ces pa ni sems can rnams 'phros pas de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa rnams nang du thim par byas nas aom dzny'a na sarbba ta th'a ga ta sta th'a aa ham zhes nga rgyal dang ldan pa de 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: kyis so // 'gro don bla med mdzad ces pa ni sems can rnams 'phros pas de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa rnams nang du thim par byas nas aom dzny'a na sarbba ta th'a ga ta sta th'a aa ham zhes nga rgyal dang ldan pa de 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The supreme benefit of beings is to be understood here as the pride I am the gnosis of accomplishment of activities of the one who, having caused the emanations of sentient beings to dissolve into the Tathagatas, then causes the Tathagatas to dissolve into oneself, and then utters the pride Om, I am the gnosis of accomplishment of activities of all Tathagatas.

original: de bas na nga rgyal de ldan zhes pa ni tshig gnyis kar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na nga rgyal de ldan zhes pa ni tshig gnyis kar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, endowed with that pride is to be understood as two words.

original: de ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching of the gnosis of accomplishing activities.

original: thub mchog rdul phran rnams bskyed pa //
analyzed: thub mchog rdul phran rnams bskyed pa //
translated: The supreme sages are generated from the atoms.

original: zhes pa ni sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la reg pas rdo rje sems dpar byas nas sa bon nang du zhugs par mthong ba dang / de yongs su gyur nas rgyal ba skyed byed sku bzhi mngon du bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la reg pas rdo rje sems dpar byas nas sa bon nang du zhugs par mthong ba dang / de yongs su gyur nas rgyal ba skyed byed sku bzhi mngon du bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The supreme sages are generated from the atoms means that the seed-syllable light rays touch the Tathagatas, and having made them into Vajrasattva, one sees the seed-syllable enter into oneself, and that having transformed, one is united with the manifest four bodies of the Victor-producing one.

original: thub pa mchog de dag gis bskyed pa ni bkod pa'o //
analyzed: thub pa mchog de dag gis bskyed pa ni bkod pa'o //
translated: The arrangement is the generation of those supreme sages.

original: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi lus ni sa la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab kyis byas pa yin no //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi lus ni sa la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab kyis byas pa yin no //
translated: The bodies of ordinary people are made of subtle particles of earth and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni thub pa'i mchog gi rdul phra rab kyis bkod pas gzhal med ces so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni thub pa'i mchog gi rdul phra rab kyis bkod pas gzhal med ces so //
translated: The body of the Bhagavat is arrayed with the subtle particles of the supreme sage.

original: zhal dang sku de ji lta bu zhe na g-yas g-yon zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhal dang sku de ji lta bu zhe na g-yas g-yon zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is the face and body like?

original: de g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ni nag po dang dmar po'o //
analyzed: de g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ni nag po dang dmar po'o //
translated: The right and left faces are black and red.

original: dbus kyi zhal dang sku ni zla ba rdzogs pa ltar dkar po'i mdog ces so //
analyzed: dbus kyi zhal dang sku ni zla ba rdzogs pa ltar dkar po'i mdog ces so //
translated: The central face and body are the color of a full moon.

original: gsal ba zhes pa ni 'od zer gsal ba dang ldan pa'i rgyan gdu bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes pa ni 'od zer gsal ba dang ldan pa'i rgyan gdu bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: The ornaments are clear, meaning they are adorned with clear light rays, such as bracelets.

original: des rnam par brgyan pa'i phyag drug las dang po gnyis kyis rang snang ba'i rig ma la 'khyud cing mchu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: des rnam par brgyan pa'i phyag drug las dang po gnyis kyis rang snang ba'i rig ma la 'khyud cing mchu 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The six hands that are adorned with that hold a consort who appears from oneself and embraces her with the lips.

original: lhag ma'i phyag ces pa ni bzhi'o //
analyzed: lhag ma'i phyag ces pa ni bzhi'o //
translated: The remaining hands are the four.

original: go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang ral gri dang rin po che dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang ral gri dang rin po che dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: They hold a vajra, sword, jewel, and lotus, respectively.

original: gzhan yang de'i khyad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i khyad par gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said to be distinguished in other ways.

original: 'jig rten gsum zhes pa ni sa 'og dang sa steng dang ma tho ris so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum zhes pa ni sa 'og dang sa steng dang ma tho ris so //
translated: The three worlds are the underworld, the earth, and the heavens.

original: de'i nang gi nam mkha'i khams te der thub pa'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi rnam par 'phro ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i nang gi nam mkha'i khams te der thub pa'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi rnam par 'phro ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The space element in them is the light rays of the Lord of Sages radiating in that way.

original: rnam thar gsum zhes pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste bshad zin to //
analyzed: rnam thar gsum zhes pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste bshad zin to //
translated: The three liberations are the three gates of liberation, as already explained.

original: de rnam par thar pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir na shes rab kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de rnam par thar pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir na shes rab kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: Liberation is its nature, so it is the nature of wisdom.

original: snying rje mchog ces pa ni rtag pa la sogs pa ro brgyad do //
analyzed: snying rje mchog ces pa ni rtag pa la sogs pa ro brgyad do //
translated: Supreme compassion is the eight flavors such as permanence.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi thabs dang ldan pa zhes pa ni thabs su gsal bar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi thabs dang ldan pa zhes pa ni thabs su gsal bar snang ba'o //
translated: Possessing the method of that nature is the method that appears clearly.

original: de'i don ni 'di lta ste don @144b dam par shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin zhing de'i ngo bor gnas kyang kun rdzob tu thabs gtso bor byed cing gzhan gyi don yod pas de ltar snang ba zhes so //
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di lta ste don @144b dam par shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin zhing de'i ngo bor gnas kyang kun rdzob tu thabs gtso bor byed cing gzhan gyi don yod pas de ltar snang ba zhes so //
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: Although it is the nature of wisdom in the ultimate sense, and abides in its essence, it appears in that way because of the relative, which is the predominance of method and the existence of the benefit of others.

original: 'gro ba thams cad ces pa ni dag pa dang ma dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad ces pa ni dag pa dang ma dag pa'o //
translated: “All beings” are pure and impure.

original: rang bzhin gcig pa zhes pa ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig pa zhes pa ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu'o //
translated: “Of one nature” is in the ultimate and relative.

original: rgyal ba ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Victors” are Mañjuśrī and so on.

original: de skyed par byed pa'i sku'i rgyu ni mngon du zhes te gsal por bsgom par bya zhes bya'i don to //
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa'i sku'i rgyu ni mngon du zhes te gsal por bsgom par bya zhes bya'i don to //
translated: The “body cause” that produces them is “clearly visualized,” meaning that it is meditated on clearly.

original: des ni shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: des ni shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bstan pa'o //
translated: That explains the wisdom of the utterly pure dharmadhātu.

original: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sku rnam par bskyed nas nga ni des sems can rnam snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur ba'i ched du padma'i nang du dkyil 'khor bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang thabs yang dag par dga' bar bya ba ston
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sku rnam par bskyed nas nga ni des sems can rnam snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur ba'i ched du padma'i nang du dkyil 'khor bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang thabs yang dag par dga' bar bya ba ston
translated: Having thus generated the form of Vajrasattva, I, for the sake of making sentient beings suitable vessels, in order to confer initiation, in order to protect the mandala in the lotus, teach the delight of wisdom and means.

original: to // mchog tu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: to // mchog tu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The supreme, etc.

original: mchog tu rjes chags zhes pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po ste yang dag par gsal ba'o //
analyzed: mchog tu rjes chags zhes pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po ste yang dag par gsal ba'o //
translated: The supreme passion is the great bliss of non-duality, which is fully manifest.

original: de nyid bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir na phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir na phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: That itself is perfect, because it is the cause of perfect bliss.

original: 'jig rten thams cad ces pa ni srid pa gsum ste khyad par du na gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa'i sems can no //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad ces pa ni srid pa gsum ste khyad par du na gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa'i sems can no //
translated: All worlds are the three existences, and in particular, sentient beings who unite in pairs.

original: 'dul dmigs nas zhes pa ni 'dod chags chen po des 'dul ba ni gsang ba 'dul pa'i snod du mthong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dul dmigs nas zhes pa ni 'dod chags chen po des 'dul ba ni gsang ba 'dul pa'i snod du mthong ba'o //
translated: Having seen the object to be tamed, means that one who is tamed by that great passion is seen to be a vessel for the Guhyasamaja.

original: sbyor ba'i sgyu 'phrul sgra yis zhes pa ni rdo rje padma yang dag par sbyor ba'i sgra sgyu ma lta bu sing sgra la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sgyu 'phrul sgra yis zhes pa ni rdo rje padma yang dag par sbyor ba'i sgra sgyu ma lta bu sing sgra la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sound of the magic of union is the sound of the magic of the vajra and lotus in union, like the sound of a lute, and so on.

original: bde bar gshegs pa rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Sugatas, etc., are Vairochana, etc.

original: rang gi lus nang zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ba spu'i bu gar thugs shing thim par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: rang gi lus nang zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ba spu'i bu gar thugs shing thim par bya'o zhes so //
translated: One’s own body is the pore of the vajra-holder, where the mind is to be placed and dissolved.

original: thim nas ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: thim nas ci bya zhe na /
translated: What is done after dissolving?

original: de ni zhes pa ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes pa ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: That, etc.

original: spyan sogs zhes pa ni spyan dang / m'a ma k'i dang na bza' dkar mo dang dam tshig sgrol ma'i lha mo'o //
analyzed: spyan sogs zhes pa ni spyan dang / m'a ma k'i dang na bza' dkar mo dang dam tshig sgrol ma'i lha mo'o //
translated: The eyes, etc., are the goddesses Locana, Mamaki, Pandara, and Samaya-Tara.

original: gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi rang bzhin zhes pa ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi rang bzhin zhes pa ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: The nature of the objects of form, etc., are the five aspects of Rupavajrā, etc.

original: byung nas zhes pa ni rang gi ba spu'i bu ga las zhes so //
analyzed: byung nas zhes pa ni rang gi ba spu'i bu ga las zhes so //
translated: Having arisen, etc., is from one’s pores.

original: rig ma thams cad ces pa ni lha mo dgu nyid do //
analyzed: rig ma thams cad ces pa ni lha mo dgu nyid do //
translated: All the knowledge-women are the nine goddesses.

original: rang snang rig pa zhes pa ni rang gi 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya thim par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: rang snang rig pa zhes pa ni rang gi 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya thim par bya'o zhes so //
translated: The so-called self-appearance awareness is the dissolution of the embracing consort.

original: chos kyi dbyings rdo rje gsungs te /🔽chos kyi @145a * //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rdo rje gsungs te / chos kyi @145a * //
translated: The vajra speech is the realm of phenomena.

original: dbyings spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pa dang / rang la snang ba'i rig pa la gnas pa dang / reg pa bde ba'i gtso bo yin pas gzugs can las reg pa 'byung ba dang / yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa ma zhums pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyings spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pa dang / rang la snang ba'i rig pa la gnas pa dang / reg pa bde ba'i gtso bo yin pas gzugs can las reg pa 'byung ba dang / yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa ma zhums pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the general characteristic, and it is the abode of the awareness that appears to oneself, and it is the primary contact bliss, and the contact arises from the form, or else, because the vajra holder is not depressed.

original: de ltar rgyud phyi ma las /
analyzed: de ltar rgyud phyi ma las /
translated: Thus, the Later Tantra says:

original: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis su //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis su //
translated: By the method of great passion,

original: ye shes 'khor lo thams cad bsdu //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo thams cad bsdu //
translated: gather the entire wheel of awareness.

original: bud med dgu ru spros nas kyang //
analyzed: bud med dgu ru spros nas kyang //
translated: Having emanated as nine women,

original: bsgrub bya ma yi sku la dgod //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ma yi sku la dgod //
translated: place them in the body of the female to be subdued.

original: ces so // sems can gzung ba'i phyir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par gsungs pa'i de'i padma'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces so // sems can gzung ba'i phyir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par gsungs pa'i de'i padma'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In order to take hold of sentient beings, the secret mandala is generated, as is said in the line beginning “his lotus.”

original: de'i padma'i zhes pa ni rang snang ba'i 'o ;
analyzed: de'i padma'i zhes pa ni rang snang ba'i 'o ;
translated: His lotus is one’s own appearance.

original: / snying po'i dbus zhes pa ni gser gyi bum pa'i nang du'o //
analyzed: / snying po'i dbus zhes pa ni gser gyi bum pa'i nang du'o //
translated: In the middle of the heart means in the golden womb.

original: dkyil 'khor blo yis bsams zhes pa ni rten dang brten can du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor blo yis bsams zhes pa ni rten dang brten can du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Imagining the mandala with the mind means the mandala of Vajrasattva, with its support and the supported.

original: de gang las byung zhe na /
analyzed: de gang las byung zhe na /
translated: From what does it arise?

original: dri med zla 'od las byung zhes te sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mjug bsdu ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis so //🔽de la / blo yis skye bo rnams gzhug bya //
analyzed: dri med zla 'od las byung zhes te sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mjug bsdu ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis so // de la / blo yis skye bo rnams gzhug bya //
translated: From stainless moonlight means from the light rays of the seed syllable, by the process of gathering the Tathagatas, and so on.

original: zhes pa ni sems can rnams gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de la so so'i sgo nas chud par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sems can rnams gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de la so so'i sgo nas chud par bya'o zhes so //
translated: There, one should introduce the people with the mind means that one should introduce each sentient being into that secret mandala.

original: da ni de rnams sdod du rung bar bya ba'i dbang bskur gsungs pa dam pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ni de rnams sdod du rung bar bya ba'i dbang bskur gsungs pa dam pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, in order to make them suitable to remain there, the consecration is stated:

original: dam pa'i rdo rje ni h'um la sogs pa las bskyed cing de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dam pa'i rdo rje ni h'um la sogs pa las bskyed cing de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The consecration of the supreme vajra is generated from the syllable hūṃ and so on, and is of the nature of that.

original: snang mdzad la sogs zhes pa ni sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshul du gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: snang mdzad la sogs zhes pa ni sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshul du gnas pa rnams so //
translated: The “Vairochana, etc.” refers to those who abide in the form of the mandala circle, urged by the light rays of the seed syllable.

original: der zhugs pa ni zla ba zhu ba'i ngo bor gyur pas zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: der zhugs pa ni zla ba zhu ba'i ngo bor gyur pas zhugs pa'o //
translated: “Having entered there” means that they have entered by becoming the essence of the melted moon.

original: dbang bskur byas pa ni zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la reg cing kha'i lam nas snying ga'i padmar zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur byas pa ni zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la reg cing kha'i lam nas snying ga'i padmar zhugs pa'o //
translated: “Having been empowered” means that they have been touched by the beings who have entered and have entered the heart lotus through the path of the mouth.

original: da ni de 'og ces pa la sogs pas dbang bskur ba'i sems can rnams bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: da ni de 'og ces pa la sogs pas dbang bskur ba'i sems can rnams bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur pa ste /
translated: Now, beginning with “after that,” the beings who have been empowered attain bliss and mental bliss.

original: de 'og ces pa ni dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de 'og ces pa ni dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu'o //
translated: “After that” means after the empowerment.

original: de la dmigs pa'i grangs su 'gro zhes pa ni de ltar dbang bskur ba'i stobs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin rnams zla bar zhu bar gyur to //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i grangs su 'gro zhes pa ni de ltar dbang bskur ba'i stobs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin rnams zla bar zhu bar gyur to //
translated: “They become counted as having that as their object” means that by the power of the empowerment, the natures of the phenomena become the melted moon.

original: de tsam na mig la sogs pa rnams sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gnas te grangs su 'gro zhes so //
analyzed: de tsam na mig la sogs pa rnams sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gnas te grangs su 'gro zhes so //
translated: At that time, the eyes, etc., abide in the nature of Kshitigarbha, etc., and they become counted.

original: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa zla bar zhub gzugs rdo rje la @145b sogs pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa zla bar zhub gzugs rdo rje la @145b sogs pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
translated: Likewise, form and so on melt into the moon, which is the nature of Vajra Body and so on.🔽Likewise, the directions and so on melt into the moon, which is the nature of Locana and so on.🔽Likewise, form and so on are the nature of Vairochana and so on.

original: de bzhin dus la sogs pa zla bar zhu ba spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du 'od de bzhin du gzugs zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin dus la sogs pa zla bar zhu ba spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du 'od de bzhin du gzugs zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //
translated: Form is the aggregate of form.

original: myong ba ni tshor ba'i phung po'o //
analyzed: myong ba ni tshor ba'i phung po'o //
translated: Experience is the aggregate of feeling.

original: mtshan ma ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste /
translated: Sign is the apprehension of signs,

original: 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
translated: which is the aggregate of perception.

original: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
translated: Formation is the aggregate of formation.

original: yid ces pa ni rig pa ste rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
analyzed: yid ces pa ni rig pa ste rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
translated: Mind is cognition, which is the aggregate of consciousness.

original: de rnams zla bar zhu ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gnas te /
analyzed: de rnams zla bar zhu ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gnas te /
translated: Those melt into the moon, which is the nature of Vairochana and so on.

original: de lta bu'i rang bzhin te 'og nas 'byung ba'i sa bon gyis rnam par bsgrubs te dbyung bar bya zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin te 'og nas 'byung ba'i sa bon gyis rnam par bsgrubs te dbyung bar bya zhes so //
translated: That nature is to be produced by the seed syllables that will be described.

original: dang po yang blos yang dag par bcug nas man ngag gzhan de la sring pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dang po yang blos yang dag par bcug nas man ngag gzhan de la sring pa ma yin no //
translated: First, having correctly inserted the mind, one should not divulge the intimate instruction to others.

original: sa bon gyis dbyung bar bya'o zhes pa ni skabs mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon gyis dbyung bar bya'o zhes pa ni skabs mi shes pa'o //
translated: The statement it is to be produced by the seed is not understood in this context.

original: sa bon thug pa med par thal ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa bon thug pa med par thal ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the fault of the seed's infinite regress would ensue.

original: mtshan gyi sngags dang bye brag ni bya ka ra na'i gzhung las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan gyi sngags dang bye brag ni bya ka ra na'i gzhung las shes par bya'o //
translated: The mantra and the distinctions of the signs should be understood from the text of the Vakyarthavaratika.

original: de bas na bla ma chen pos kyang 'di nyid du bskyed par bya ba'i don du gsungs te /
analyzed: de bas na bla ma chen pos kyang 'di nyid du bskyed par bya ba'i don du gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, the great guru also said in this very [text] that it is to be produced,

original: dbyung bar bya ba ni ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dbyung bar bya ba ni ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: but not to be produced.

original: skyed par byed pa'i sa bon dngos gang zhe na /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i sa bon dngos gang zhe na /
translated: What is the actual seed that produces?

original: kshim zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kshim zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the kṣiṃ and so forth.

original: de'i don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: sems can de rnams dbang bskur bas chos rnams zla bar zhu ba'i rang bzhin de las kshim la sogs pa'i sa bon du gyur te /
analyzed: sems can de rnams dbang bskur bas chos rnams zla bar zhu ba'i rang bzhin de las kshim la sogs pa'i sa bon du gyur te /
translated: Those sentient beings, through the empowerment, the nature of the melting of phenomena into the moon, become the seed syllables kṣiṃ and so forth.

original: de las 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan bsgoms te /
analyzed: de las 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan bsgoms te /
translated: From that, one should meditate on the hand implements such as the wheel and so forth.

original: de las sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i gzugs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khams kun 'dus par byas nas gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas dbyung bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de las sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i gzugs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khams kun 'dus par byas nas gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas dbyung bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: From that, having caused the collection of all the constituents to be the twenty-one forms of Kṣhitigarbha, etc., one should emit them by the procedure stated above.

original: 'di rnams rang gi rang bzhin dang / chos kyi rang bzhin dang sa bon gyi rang bzhin las byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'di rnams rang gi rang bzhin dang / chos kyi rang bzhin dang sa bon gyi rang bzhin las byung ba rnams so //
translated: These are arisen from their own nature, the nature of the Dharma, and the nature of the seed.

original: da ni bar gyi srid pa'i sems las mchog gi bsnyen pas 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i bskyed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni bar gyi srid pa'i sems las mchog gi bsnyen pas 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i bskyed pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the generation of Mañjuvajra by the supreme service from the mind of the intermediate state is stated:

original: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ, etc.

original: de la aom a'a: h'um zhes sems pa ni bar gyi srid pa'i sems so //
analyzed: de la aom a'a: h'um zhes sems pa ni bar gyi srid pa'i sems so //
translated: There, the mind of Oṃ āḥ hūṃ is the mind of the intermediate state.

original: de rnams 'od zer 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams 'od zer 'bar ba'o //
translated: Those are blazing light rays.

original: ho: dmar po gnyis kyi bar du bcug par bsams nas cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni nam mkha' las rang gi zhal du zhugs par byas nas dam pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje'i lam du byung ba'o //
analyzed: ho: dmar po gnyis kyi bar du bcug par bsams nas cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni nam mkha' las rang gi zhal du zhugs par byas nas dam pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje'i lam du byung ba'o //
translated: Having imagined that they enter one’s mouth from space, “as in the rite,” they emerge in the path of the vajra of the sublime secret.

original: de gang du gnas she na /
analyzed: de gang du gnas she na /
translated: Where is that?

original: padma'i nang gnas zhes te shes rab ma'i padma'i ge sar gyi dbus @146a * //
analyzed: padma'i nang gnas zhes te shes rab ma'i padma'i ge sar gyi dbus @146a * //
translated: “Residing in the lotus” means residing in the center of the pistil of the lotus of the wisdom consort.

original: su chud par gnas te de yang sems can thams cad kyi lus la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gzhal med ces so //
analyzed: su chud par gnas te de yang sems can thams cad kyi lus la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gzhal med ces so //
translated: “Immeasurable” means that the moon is immeasurable because it is the nature of the bodies and so on of all sentient beings.

original: shes rab chags pas zhes pa ni shes rab ma yang dag pa'i 'dod chags chen po dang ldan pas gdong padma r'a ga ltar gyur pa'i stobs kyis yi ge lnga po zhu bar byed pa mtho ste zhes so //
analyzed: shes rab chags pas zhes pa ni shes rab ma yang dag pa'i 'dod chags chen po dang ldan pas gdong padma r'a ga ltar gyur pa'i stobs kyis yi ge lnga po zhu bar byed pa mtho ste zhes so //
translated: “Through the passion of wisdom” means that the wisdom consort, endowed with the great passion of reality, melts the five syllables through the power of her face becoming like a ruby.

original: de'i 'od kyi mthu yis zhes pa ni yig 'bru zhu ba'i 'od zer dmar bas so //
analyzed: de'i 'od kyi mthu yis zhes pa ni yig 'bru zhu ba'i 'od zer dmar bas so //
translated: “By the power of its light” means by the red light rays of the melted syllables.

original: gnyis kyang zla bar zhu zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang rang snang ba'i rig ma yang 'od zer des dbus kyi zla ba'i gdan la byang chub sems kyi gzugs su mthong bar bya ste bsgom zhes so //
analyzed: gnyis kyang zla bar zhu zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang rang snang ba'i rig ma yang 'od zer des dbus kyi zla ba'i gdan la byang chub sems kyi gzugs su mthong bar bya ste bsgom zhes so //
translated: “Both also melt into the moon” means that the moon seat in the center is seen as the form of bodhicitta through the light rays of Vajrasattva and the awareness partner who is his self-appearance.

original: de ltar snang ba med pas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir sngon goms pa'i tshad med pa bzhi'i gzugs spyan ma la sogs pa rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas bskul gsungs pa 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba med pas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir sngon goms pa'i tshad med pa bzhi'i gzugs spyan ma la sogs pa rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas bskul gsungs pa 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the four immeasurables of former habituation, such as Locanā, are invoked by means of their respective lords.🔽This is as follows:

original: de yang bdag gis sngon sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu las grol bar bya'o zhes gang bsam pa ste snang ba med bas de rnams spangs pa yin pas te de rnams nyid lha mo'i gzugs su gyur nas 'od kyi gong bu las phyung nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i bstod
analyzed: de yang bdag gis sngon sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu las grol bar bya'o zhes gang bsam pa ste snang ba med bas de rnams spangs pa yin pas te de rnams nyid lha mo'i gzugs su gyur nas 'od kyi gong bu las phyung nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i bstod
translated: Moreover, whatever was intended by me previously, in order to be liberated from suffering and its cause, that is, since there is no appearance, those are abandoned, and they themselves become the form of the goddesses, emerge from the mass of light, and are invoked by the praise that will be stated below.

original: pas bskul te thim par gyur to zhes so //
analyzed: pas bskul te thim par gyur to zhes so //
translated: They dissolve into the form of the lord.

original: 'dir go rims kyis spyan ma la sogs bskul bar rigs pa la m'a ma k'is dang por bskul ba ni rgyud 'di la thugs gtso bor bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir go rims kyis spyan ma la sogs bskul bar rigs pa la m'a ma k'is dang por bskul ba ni rgyud 'di la thugs gtso bor bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is reasonable to invoke Locanā and so on in order, but Māmakī invokes first because in this tantra the mind is taught to be primary.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what is that?

original: sems can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the sentient beings, and so on.

original: de yang sems can gyi khams gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang sems can gyi khams gsum ste /
translated: The realm of sentient beings is threefold.

original: der gnas pa ni sems can rnams so //
analyzed: der gnas pa ni sems can rnams so //
translated: Those who abide there are sentient beings.

original: de rnams kyi gtso bo ni dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gtso bo ni dbang phyug go //
translated: The chief of them is the Lord.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is he like?

original: rdo rje thugs zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje thugs zhes so //
translated: He is the vajra mind.

original: chos kyi dbyings ye shes rnam par dag pa'i gzugs su gyur pas na rdo rje thugs zhes bod pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ye shes rnam par dag pa'i gzugs su gyur pas na rdo rje thugs zhes bod pa ste /
translated: Since he is the form of the gnosis of the ultimate realm, he is called the vajra mind.

original: kye khyod bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
analyzed: kye khyod bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
translated: O you, please protect me!

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is the connection.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: dga' ba yid 'ong zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste dga' ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi'o //
analyzed: dga' ba yid 'ong zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste dga' ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi'o //
translated: By the delightful, pleasing, etc. Delight is the method and wisdom.

original: de nyid yid tshim par byed pas na yid 'ong zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid yid tshim par byed pas na yid 'ong zhes so //
translated: Since that itself satisfies the mind, it is called pleasing.

original: don chen ni don chen po yin pa'am de'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don chen ni don chen po yin pa'am de'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The great meaning is the great meaning or the cause of that.

original: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa ste de rnams kyi bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhes te dgyes par mdzod ces so //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa ste de rnams kyi bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhes te dgyes par mdzod ces so //
translated: Desire is form, etc. Please protect me from those! means be pleased!

original: mgon @146b po zhes bos nas gal te bdag m'a ma k'i dus di ring gson par mchis bzhed na zhas pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ye shes kyi sku 'byung ba chen po gzugs su mdzad nas byams pa tshad med pa spangs pas bdag shi ba dang 'dra
analyzed: mgon @146b po zhes bos nas gal te bdag m'a ma k'i dus di ring gson par mchis bzhed na zhas pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ye shes kyi sku 'byung ba chen po gzugs su mdzad nas byams pa tshad med pa spangs pas bdag shi ba dang 'dra
translated: Having addressed the Lord, If you wish to live today, means that the Bhagavat, having created the great element of the gnosis body, abandoned immeasurable love, and so it is as if I have died.🔽If you wish to live, means that the great father of sentient beings, having abandoned immeasurable compassion, is as if dead.🔽 Having addressed the friend, If you wish to live, means that the great mother of sentient beings, having abandoned immeasurable joy, is as if dead.

original: bas bdag srid par bzhed na sems can yab chen po gnyen po zhes bos nas gal te sems can thams cad dang sangs rgyas thams cad skyed par byed pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: bas bdag srid par bzhed na sems can yab chen po gnyen po zhes bos nas gal te sems can thams cad dang sangs rgyas thams cad skyed par byed pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Having addressed the kinsman, If you wish to live, means that the great kinsman of sentient beings, having abandoned immeasurable equanimity, is as if dead.

original: bdag la dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni ye shes kyi sku snang ba med rnam par spongs la zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i sku ston cig pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni ye shes kyi sku snang ba med rnam par spongs la zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i sku ston cig pa'o //
translated: Having addressed the Lord, If you wish to live today, means that the Bhagavat, having created the great element of the gnosis body, abandoned immeasurable love, and so it is as if I have died.🔽If you wish to live, means that the great father of sentient beings, having abandoned immeasurable compassion, is as if dead.🔽 Having addressed the friend, If you wish to live, means that the great mother of sentient beings, having abandoned immeasurable joy, is as if dead.🔽 Having addressed the kinsman, If you wish to live, means that the great kinsman of sentient beings, having abandoned immeasurable equanimity, is as if dead.

original: rdo rje sku khyod ces pa ni spyan mas sku'i rigs kyi sgo nas me long lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas de skad do //
analyzed: rdo rje sku khyod ces pa ni spyan mas sku'i rigs kyi sgo nas me long lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas de skad do //
translated: Having addressed the Lord, If you wish to live today, means that the Bhagavat, having created the great element of the gnosis body, abandoned immeasurable love, and so it is as if I have died.🔽If you wish to live, means that the great father of sentient beings, having

original: bka'i 'khor lo zhes pa ni bka' nyid kyi 'khor los 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyud la 'jug par mdzad pas na sems can kun la phan zhes tshim par mdzad pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas don dang byang chub dang don dam pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: bka'i 'khor lo zhes pa ni bka' nyid kyi 'khor los 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyud la 'jug par mdzad pas na sems can kun la phan zhes tshim par mdzad pa'o // sangs rgyas don dang byang chub dang don dam pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: The wheel of the command is the wheel of the command itself, which is set in motion in the mind-streams of transmigrators, and thus it is the satisfaction of all beings.🔽The meaning of Buddha, enlightenment, and the knowledge of the ultimate is the nature of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas pa'i don du byang chub don dam phan par rjes su dgongs pa'i gzigs pa'i ngang tshul gang yin pa de skad du zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa'i don du byang chub don dam phan par rjes su dgongs pa'i gzigs pa'i ngang tshul gang yin pa de skad du zhes bya'o //
translated: The meaning of Buddha is enlightenment, the ultimate benefit, which is the nature of the Buddha.

original: mgon po zhes pa la sogs pa ni brda phrad par zad do //
analyzed: mgon po zhes pa la sogs pa ni brda phrad par zad do //
translated: The Lord, etc., is merely a salutation.

original: 'dod chags ni mchog tu bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni mchog tu bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Passion is supreme great bliss.

original: de nyid don chen po las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid don chen po las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since it does not pass beyond that great meaning, it is a pledge.

original: de lta bu'i rol bas bdag spyan ma la zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rol bas bdag spyan ma la zhes so //
translated: By such play, I am Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: Be pleased is as before.

original: khyod ni rdo rje gsungs te zhes pa ni na bza' dkar mos rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas so so'i kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na de skad do //
analyzed: khyod ni rdo rje gsungs te zhes pa ni na bza' dkar mos rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas so so'i kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na de skad do //
translated: You are the vajra speech, because of being the nature of the wisdom of individual investigation through the lord of your own family, namely, the white-robed one.

original: sems can kun la byams pas phan zhing snying rje chen pos thugs brtse ba'i ngang tshul mnga' bas de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: sems can kun la byams pas phan zhing snying rje chen pos thugs brtse ba'i ngang tshul mnga' bas de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: You are the one who is compassionate, because of being the nature of the great compassion that benefits all sentient beings with love.

original: 'jig rten dag gi don zhes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag gi don zhes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The purpose of the worlds is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: dgos pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dgos pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The need is the characteristic of the perfection of mundane happiness.

original: de mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: You are the one who is always striving, because of being endowed with great effort in accomplishing that.

original: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin du'o //
translated: The lord, etc., are as above.

original: spyod pa dri med ces pa thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa dri med ces pa thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa'o //
translated: The conduct is stainless, because of being the conduct of method and wisdom.

original: de nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas na dri med do //
analyzed: de nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas na dri med do //
translated: It is stainless because it is free from the apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: gang ltar spyad kyang nyes pa med pas na kun du bzang po'o//
analyzed: gang ltar spyad kyang nyes pa med pas na kun du bzang po'o//
translated: It is all-good because there is no fault in any practice.

original: @147a * // bdag la dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni gong ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: @147a * // bdag la dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni gong ma bzhin du'o //
translated: Please be pleased with me is as above.

original: khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa zhes pa la sogs pas lha mo sgrol mas rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas rdo rjer gyur cing gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bor gyur pa'i dngos po lnga'i rang bzhin de ni rdo rjer 'dod ces bod pa'o
analyzed: khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa zhes pa la sogs pas lha mo sgrol mas rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas rdo rjer gyur cing gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bor gyur pa'i dngos po lnga'i rang bzhin de ni rdo rjer 'dod ces bod pa'o
translated: You are the vajra desire, etc. The goddess Tara, by means of her family lord, says, That which is vajra-like, having the nature of the five things that have become the essence of nondual wisdom, is desired as vajra.

original: // dam tshig ces pa ni don yod grub pa ste de nyid mchog tu gyur pas na dam tshig mchog go //
analyzed: // dam tshig ces pa ni don yod grub pa ste de nyid mchog tu gyur pas na dam tshig mchog go //
translated: Commitment is Amoghasiddhi, and since he is supreme, he is the supreme commitment.

original: phan don che zhes pa ni bdag 'khor ba nas don bya'i gzhan gyi go skabs mi sbyin no zhes bya ba'i ngang tshul gyi 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa rgya chen po mdzad pas na de skad do //
analyzed: phan don che zhes pa ni bdag 'khor ba nas don bya'i gzhan gyi go skabs mi sbyin no zhes bya ba'i ngang tshul gyi 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa rgya chen po mdzad pas na de skad do //
translated: Great benefit is the attitude, I will not give an opportunity to others who are objects of benefit in samsara, and since he performs great benefit for all migrating beings, it is said.

original: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung //
translated: the lineage of the perfect, complete Buddha.

original: zhes pa ni rigs te de nyid thig ler gyur pas na mchog gi mnyam pa nyid ni zab mo dang gsal bar dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rigs te de nyid thig ler gyur pas na mchog gi mnyam pa nyid ni zab mo dang gsal bar dbyer med pa'o //
translated: The lineage is the cause, and since that very [lineage] is the bindu, the equality of the supreme is the indivisibility of the profound and the clear.

original: de skad cig gis rtogs pa de la mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de skad cig gis rtogs pa de la mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The view of equality is the instantaneous realization of that.

original: mgon po zhes pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: mgon po zhes pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The protector and so on have been explained.

original: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur zhes pa ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i yon tan rin chen mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur zhes pa ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i yon tan rin chen mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The source of many jewels of qualities is the source of many jewels of qualities, such as the ten powers.

original: bdag la dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: bdag la dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: The delight in me is as before.

original: da ni de lta bu'i ngang tshul las zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i ngo bo chos kyi dbyings kyi sku 'byung ba gsungs ba de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ni de lta bu'i ngang tshul las zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i ngo bo chos kyi dbyings kyi sku 'byung ba gsungs ba de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, the arising of the dharmadhatu kaya, the entity of the profound and the utterly clear, from such a state is stated:

original: de ltar dbyangs kyis bskul zhes pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i glus so //
analyzed: de ltar dbyangs kyis bskul zhes pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i glus so //
translated: Thus, the one who is called the one to be pleased is the one who is to be pleased by the song just explained.

original: chos kun sgyu ma lta bur legs bsams nas //
analyzed: chos kun sgyu ma lta bur legs bsams nas //
translated: Having well contemplated all phenomena as illusion-like,

original: zhes pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das ba sgyu ma 'dra bar bsgrub pas te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das ba sgyu ma 'dra bar bsgrub pas te /
translated: This is establishing samsara and nirvana as similar to an illusion.

original: gang rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i dbang gis rnam pa sna tshogs su snang yang de nyid na de nyid kyis dben pa de ltar 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyi ga yang de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i dbang gis rnam pa sna tshogs su snang yang de nyid na de nyid kyis dben pa de ltar 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyi ga yang de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Although various appearances occur due to the power of the assembly of causes and conditions, they are devoid of inherent nature. In the same way, both samsara and nirvana are similar to that.

original: de gnyi ga la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de gnyi ga la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba bya'o zhes so //
translated: One should engage in the practice of not abiding in either of those two.

original: dngos po rnams de ltar bsams nas khu ba las byung ba'i mam las gyur ba'i ral gri chang gzungs dkyil du zla ba cig bsgoms te de yang ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po rnams de ltar bsams nas khu ba las byung ba'i mam las gyur ba'i ral gri chang gzungs dkyil du zla ba cig bsgoms te de yang ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: Having contemplated phenomena in that way, one should meditate on a sword arisen from the syllable mam in the center of the moon arisen from the syllable kham. What is that like?

original: snang ba'i 'od zer gyis bskor gzhi sngags lum su rung nyid gyur zhes te 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i 'phro ba'i mam gyi gzugs su rang gi sems nyid bsam mo zhes so //
analyzed: snang ba'i 'od zer gyis bskor gzhi sngags lum su rung nyid gyur zhes te 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i 'phro ba'i mam gyi gzugs su rang gi sems nyid bsam mo zhes so //
translated: Surrounded by the light rays of appearance, the basis becomes the syllable mam. One should contemplate one's own mind in the form of the syllable mam, radiating immeasurable light rays.

original: de'i stobs kyis zhes pa ni sa bon de'i'o //
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis zhes pa ni sa bon de'i'o //
translated: The power of that refers to the power of that seed.

original: lha rnam par 'phrul ba'i thub dbang @147b gis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: lha rnam par 'phrul ba'i thub dbang @147b gis zhes pa ni /
translated: The lord of sages, the emanation of the gods refers to

original: 'od kyis reg pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa ji snyed pa'i gzugs byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gzugs su gyur nas rnam par sprul zhes so //
analyzed: 'od kyis reg pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa ji snyed pa'i gzugs byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gzugs su gyur nas rnam par sprul zhes so //
translated: the form of the buddhas, and so on, touched by light, which become the form of the bodhisattva Mañjughoṣa and emanate.

original: nang du thim nas zhes pa ni de rnams 'od zer gyis bkug nas nang gi sa bon gyi nang du chud pas de ma thag tu yid kyi dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur par bya zhes so //
analyzed: nang du thim nas zhes pa ni de rnams 'od zer gyis bkug nas nang gi sa bon gyi nang du chud pas de ma thag tu yid kyi dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur par bya zhes so //
translated: Having dissolved inwardly, having drawn them in with light, they enter into the inner seed, and immediately one should become the glorious Mañjuvajra with the mind.

original: dpal ni gong du bshad par zad do //
analyzed: dpal ni gong du bshad par zad do //
translated: The glory has already been explained above.

original: 'jam pa'i rdo rje ji lta bu zhe na gur gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i rdo rje ji lta bu zhe na gur gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is Mañjuvajra like? Three layers of armor, and so on.

original: dbus kyi zhal dang sku ni gur gsum bzang po ltar dmar ser du gnas la g-yas sngo g-yon dkar ba'i mdog tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi zhal dang sku ni gur gsum bzang po ltar dmar ser du gnas la g-yas sngo g-yon dkar ba'i mdog tu gnas pa'o //
translated: The central face and body remain red-yellow, like the excellent three layers of armor, and the right is blue and the left is white.

original: sna tshogs rgyan zhes pa ni gdu bu la sogs pa ste des rnam par brgyan pa'i phyag drug pa dang po gnyis kyis dmar pa'i shes rab ma 'khyud nas ma mchu tshems kyis bzung nas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan zhes pa ni gdu bu la sogs pa ste des rnam par brgyan pa'i phyag drug pa dang po gnyis kyis dmar pa'i shes rab ma 'khyud nas ma mchu tshems kyis bzung nas gnas pa'o //
translated: The “ornaments” are bracelets and so on, and he is adorned with them. He has six arms, the first two embracing the red Prajñā, his consort, who is standing, her lower lip held by his teeth.

original: lhag ma na gnas pa'i ral gri dang mda' dang gzhan yang autpala sngon po dang gzhung bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma na gnas pa'i ral gri dang mda' dang gzhan yang autpala sngon po dang gzhung bsnams pa'o //
translated: In the remaining hands he holds a sword, an arrow, and a blue lotus.

original: mtha' yas ni mang po'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas ni mang po'o //
translated: “Infinite” means many.

original: 'od ni zer de las kyang ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas brgyan pa'i mkha' zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams gang ba'i rgyan gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'od ni zer de las kyang ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas brgyan pa'i mkha' zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams gang ba'i rgyan gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: “The sky adorned with the light rays emanating from the families” means that he is so called because he is adorned with the sky filled with the emanations of the Tathāgatas and so on.

original: de skyob pa zhes pa ni rang gi mthong ba'i lam gzhan la ston pa yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de skyob pa zhes pa ni rang gi mthong ba'i lam gzhan la ston pa yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: “The protector” is so called because he has the teaching of his own path of seeing to others.

original: sku de'i dag pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sku de'i dag pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The purity of that body is as follows.

original: dbu gsum ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo //
analyzed: dbu gsum ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo //
translated: The three heads are the three doors of liberation.

original: kha dog gsum ni sku gsung thugs gsum mo //
analyzed: kha dog gsum ni sku gsung thugs gsum mo //
translated: The three colors are the three bodies, speech, and mind.

original: phyag drug ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
analyzed: phyag drug ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
translated: The six arms are the six perfections.

original: snang ba'i rig mas 'khyud pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba'i rig mas 'khyud pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis mi gtong ba'o //
translated: The embrace by the knowledge-woman of appearance is the non-abandonment by non-dual intuition.

original: phyag mtshan rnams ni rigs sna tshogs kyi yon tan mnga' ba'i rtags te /
analyzed: phyag mtshan rnams ni rigs sna tshogs kyi yon tan mnga' ba'i rtags te /
translated: The hand-symbols are the signs of the possession of the various family qualities.

original: gzhan yang sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i bud med las don thams cad 'byung bas na shes rab de'i yul du mdzes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i bud med las don thams cad 'byung bas na shes rab de'i yul du mdzes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is in order to beautify the object of that wisdom, since all objects are produced from the woman who is adorned with the various [symbols].

original: gzhan yang rang bzhin med pas gang de chos skur brjod cing sku de ni rnam pa'i mchog rnams dang ldan pas longs spyod rdzogs par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rang bzhin med pas gang de chos skur brjod cing sku de ni rnam pa'i mchog rnams dang ldan pas longs spyod rdzogs par bshad pa'o //
translated: Moreover, since [the deity] is without intrinsic reality, he is called the Dharma Body, and that body is explained as the Complete Enjoyment, since it possesses the best of forms.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyud smin pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyud smin pa //
translated: The ripening of the continuums of migrating beings

original: sprul pa'i skur yang bshad pa yin //
analyzed: sprul pa'i skur yang bshad pa yin //
translated: is also explained as the Emanation Body.

original: zhes pa 'di rnams lha thams cad bsgre bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'di rnams lha thams cad bsgre bar bya'o //
translated: All of these [bodies] should be applied to all of the deities.

original: da ni 'di'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par bsgrub pa'i phyir gzung 'dzin zhes pa la sogs @148a * //
analyzed: da ni 'di'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par bsgrub pa'i phyir gzung 'dzin zhes pa la sogs @148a * //
translated: grasping and grasped, etc.

original: pa'o // de la gzung bzhes pa ni phyi'i dngos po rnams so //
analyzed: pa'o // de la gzung bzhes pa ni phyi'i dngos po rnams so //
translated: There, grasping is the external things.

original: 'dzin pa zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa nang nas yongs su gsal ba'i bdag nyid can te dngos po thams cad ces pa ni phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad do //
analyzed: 'dzin pa zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa nang nas yongs su gsal ba'i bdag nyid can te dngos po thams cad ces pa ni phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad do //
translated: Grasped is the inner nature of consciousness, which is the manifestation of all things.

original: dngos po thams cad kyang gzung 'dzin gyi dngos po'i ngo bo nyid med par shes par byas nas kyang byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyang gzung 'dzin gyi dngos po'i ngo bo nyid med par shes par byas nas kyang byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes so //
translated: Having understood that all things are without the nature of the entity of grasped and grasper, one should also bless them.

original: de ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i snang ba dang bral ba yin pas des don ji ltar byed ce na /🔽rnam par byang la mngon par zhe na //
analyzed: de ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i snang ba dang bral ba yin pas des don ji ltar byed ce na / rnam par byang la mngon par zhe na //
translated: Thus, since it is free from the appearance of non-entityness, how does it function for the purpose?🔽It is said:🔽Attachment to purification.

original: zhes gsungs la rnam par byang ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs la rnam par byang ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Purification is nirvana.

original: de la mngon par zhen pa ni thal byung gi zab mo la blo shin tu chags pa'o //
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa ni thal byung gi zab mo la blo shin tu chags pa'o //
translated: Attachment to that is excessive attachment to the profound.

original: de zad pa ni spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de zad pa ni spangs pa'o //
translated: The exhaustion of that is abandonment.

original: sems can gyi ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: sems can gyi ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the case with sentient beings?

original: sgyu ma lta bu sku'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu sku'o //
translated: The body is like an illusion.

original: de bas na zhen pa gnyis bsal ba'i don du chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab pa 'di ltar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de bas na zhen pa gnyis bsal ba'i don du chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab pa 'di ltar bya'o zhes so //
translated: Therefore, in order to remove the two attachments, one should consecrate the realm of phenomena in this way.

original: aom zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: aom zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: Om has been explained.

original: dharmma zhes pa ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i chos so //
analyzed: dharmma zhes pa ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i chos so //
translated: Dharma refers to the phenomena of the ten powers and so forth.

original: dh'a tu zhes pa ni dbyings te zab mo dang gsal ba'i sku'o //
analyzed: dh'a tu zhes pa ni dbyings te zab mo dang gsal ba'i sku'o //
translated: Dhatu refers to the realm, the profound and clear body.

original: sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis kha dog la sogs pa'i dbye ba las thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir byang chub kyi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis kha dog la sogs pa'i dbye ba las thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir byang chub kyi rgyu yin no //
translated: Since everything is accomplished through the divisions of color and so forth by the power of sentient beings' aspirations, it is the cause of enlightenment.

original: de lta bu'i sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes nga rgyal bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes nga rgyal bya'o //
translated: One should have the pride of saying, I am such a svabhava-atmako 'ham.

original: de bas na snang ba las dngos por dmigs par thal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na snang ba las dngos por dmigs par thal ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it does not follow that things are observed in appearances.

original: snang ba'i rnam pas chos kyi dbyings brtag pa'i phyir de med na chos kyi dbyings dang 'brel ba med do //
analyzed: snang ba'i rnam pas chos kyi dbyings brtag pa'i phyir de med na chos kyi dbyings dang 'brel ba med do //
translated: Because the realm of phenomena is investigated by the aspect of appearances, if that does not exist, it is not related to the realm of phenomena.

original: 'di ni sngags kyi theg pa ni thabs gsal ba'i sgo nas sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni sngags kyi theg pa ni thabs gsal ba'i sgo nas sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the Mantra Vehicle has various kinds of benefit for sentient beings by means of the clarity of the method.

original: gang gi phyir zab mo la zhen pa'i blo ni mya ngan las 'das pa la chags pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zab mo la zhen pa'i blo ni mya ngan las 'das pa la chags pa ste /
translated: Because of that, the mind attached to the profound is attached to nirvāṇa.

original: des phan pa med pa'i steng du dge ba 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des phan pa med pa'i steng du dge ba 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By that, there is no benefit, and virtue is destroyed.

original: de bas na zab mo dang gsal ba dbyer med pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir de skad ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na zab mo dang gsal ba dbyer med pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir de skad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not so because the profound and the clarity are inseparable and everything is accomplished.

original: de bas na bla ma chen po'i zhal snga nas kyang /
analyzed: de bas na bla ma chen po'i zhal snga nas kyang /
translated: Therefore, the great guru’s oral instruction also says:

original: zab mo kho nas bsgom pa yang //
analyzed: zab mo kho nas bsgom pa yang //
translated: Also, meditation on the profound alone

original: rnam par dag pa bsgom mi bya //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa bsgom mi bya //
translated: is not meditation on complete purity.

original: gsal ba dag kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gsal ba dag kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Clarity is also like that.

original: de gnyis dbyer med bsgom 'gyur ba //
analyzed: de gnyis dbyer med bsgom 'gyur ba //
translated: Meditation on the inseparability of those two

original: bcings ba kun las grol ba yin //
analyzed: bcings ba kun las grol ba yin //
translated: is liberation from all bondage.

original: zhes so // yang de nyid las /🔽zab mo yis ni sems can don //
analyzed: zhes so // yang de nyid las / zab mo yis ni sems can don //
translated: Also, that same text says:🔽The profound alone is not able to accomplish

original: @148b thabs ltar yang dag byed mi nus //
analyzed: @148b thabs ltar yang dag byed mi nus //
translated: the benefit of sentient beings in the right way, like the method.

original: de bas de la blo chags pa //
analyzed: de bas de la blo chags pa //
translated: Therefore, the mind attached to that

original: da ni yang dag ma dad do //
analyzed: da ni yang dag ma dad do //
translated: is not right faith.

original: de nyid du nga du 'jug shes na //
analyzed: de nyid du nga du 'jug shes na //
translated: If one understands that very self,

original: ngas bstan de nyid rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: ngas bstan de nyid rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: one will realize that reality which I teach.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: and so on.

original: de bas na 'di ni shes pa nyid dbyer med pas srid pa dang zhi ba so sor nye bas na bsnyen pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni shes pa nyid dbyer med pas srid pa dang zhi ba so sor nye bas na bsnyen pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, this is the approach, because of the indivisibility of consciousness itself, to the individual proximity of existence and peace.

original: de nyid ye shes yongs su dag pa'i nge bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rang dang 'dra ba las byung bas rgyu mthun pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes yongs su dag pa'i nge bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rang dang 'dra ba las byung bas rgyu mthun pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called the natural outflow, because the Tathāgata, etc., who are the nature of completely pure intuition, arise from that which is similar to oneself.

original: 'dis ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chud du dang bsnyen pa'i yan lag chung ngu ste dang po'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chud du dang bsnyen pa'i yan lag chung ngu ste dang po'o //
translated: This is the first small branch of the result as natural outflow and the approach.

original: da ni de 'og ces pa la sogs pas skye mched rnams byin gyis brlabs na thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid med de /
analyzed: da ni de 'og ces pa la sogs pas skye mched rnams byin gyis brlabs na thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid med de /
